org.archive.crawler.selftest

类 CheckpointSelfTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.archive.crawler.selftest.SelfTestCase
          • org.archive.crawler.selftest.CheckpointSelfTest
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    junit.framework.Test, CrawlStatusListener, CrawlURIDispositionListener

    public class CheckpointSelfTest
extends SelfTestCase
implements CrawlStatusListener, CrawlURIDispositionListener
    Assumes checkpoint was run during the SelfTest.

    • 字段概要

                                   javax.management.MBeanException,

      • crawlCheckpoint

        public void crawlCheckpoint(java.io.File checkpointDir)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: CrawlStatusListener
        Called by CrawlController when checkpointing.
        指定者:
        crawlCheckpoint 在接口中 CrawlStatusListener
        参数:
        checkpointDir - Checkpoint dir. Write checkpoint state here.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - A fatal exception. Any exceptions that are let out of this checkpoint are assumed fatal and terminate further checkpoint processing.

      • crawlEnded

        public void crawlEnded(java.lang.String sExitMessage)
        从接口复制的说明: CrawlStatusListener
        Called when a CrawlController has ended a crawl and is about to exit.
        指定者:
        crawlEnded 在接口中 CrawlStatusListener
        参数:
        sExitMessage - Type of exit. Should be one of the STATUS constants in defined in CrawlJob.
        另请参阅:
        CrawlJob

      • crawlEnding

        public void crawlEnding(java.lang.String sExitMessage)
        从接口复制的说明: CrawlStatusListener
        Called when a CrawlController is ending a crawl (for any reason)
        指定者:
        crawlEnding 在接口中 CrawlStatusListener
        参数:
        sExitMessage - Type of exit. Should be one of the STATUS constants in defined in CrawlJob.
        另请参阅:
        CrawlJob

      • crawlPaused

        public void crawlPaused(java.lang.String statusMessage)
        从接口复制的说明: CrawlStatusListener
        Called when a CrawlController is actually paused (all threads are idle).
        指定者:
        crawlPaused 在接口中 CrawlStatusListener
        参数:
        statusMessage - Should be CrawlJob.STATUS_PAUSED. Passed for convenience

      • crawlPausing

        public void crawlPausing(java.lang.String statusMessage)
        从接口复制的说明: CrawlStatusListener
        Called when a CrawlController is going to be paused.
        指定者:
        crawlPausing 在接口中 CrawlStatusListener
        参数:
        statusMessage - Should be STATUS_WAITING_FOR_PAUSE. Passed for convenience

      • crawlResuming

        public void crawlResuming(java.lang.String statusMessage)
        从接口复制的说明: CrawlStatusListener
        Called when a CrawlController is resuming a crawl that had been paused.
        指定者:
        crawlResuming 在接口中 CrawlStatusListener
        参数:
        statusMessage - Should be CrawlJob.STATUS_RUNNING. Passed for convenience

      • crawlStarted

        public void crawlStarted(java.lang.String message)
        从接口复制的说明: CrawlStatusListener
        Called on crawl start.
        指定者:
        crawlStarted 在接口中 CrawlStatusListener
        参数:
        message - Start message.

      • crawledURIDisregard

        public void crawledURIDisregard(CrawlURI curi)
        从接口复制的说明: CrawlURIDispositionListener
        Notification of a crawled URI that is to be disregarded. Usually this means that the robots.txt file for the relevant site forbids this from being crawled and we are therefor not going to keep it. Other reasons may apply. In all cases this means that it was successfully downloaded but will not be stored.
        指定者:
        crawledURIDisregard 在接口中 CrawlURIDispositionListener
        参数:
        curi - The relevant CrawlURI

      • crawledURIFailure

        public void crawledURIFailure(CrawlURI curi)
        从接口复制的说明: CrawlURIDispositionListener
        Notification of a failed crawling of a URI. The failure is of a type that precludes retries (either by it's very nature or because it has been retried to many times)
        指定者:
        crawledURIFailure 在接口中 CrawlURIDispositionListener
        参数:
        curi - The relevant CrawlURI

      • crawledURINeedRetry

        public void crawledURINeedRetry(CrawlURI curi)
        从接口复制的说明: CrawlURIDispositionListener
        Notification of a failed crawl of a URI that will be retried (failure due to possible transient problems).
        指定者:
        crawledURINeedRetry 在接口中 CrawlURIDispositionListener
        参数:
        curi - The relevant CrawlURI

      • crawledURISuccessful

        public void crawledURISuccessful(CrawlURI curi)
        从接口复制的说明: CrawlURIDispositionListener
        Notification of a successfully crawled URI
        指定者:
        crawledURISuccessful 在接口中 CrawlURIDispositionListener
        参数:
        curi - The relevant CrawlURI
